Strength, Barkskin and Regeneration

spell id [id]: 27

spec [spec]: 16384

Bless/Buff: Barkskin, Limited Regeneration, Extra Strength
 
(Ignores Shields [ignoreshield])
The caster connects himself with the might of the living Earth. This connection gives him regenerative abilities, increased strength, a rougher skin and increased Nature magic power.
Grants Nature magic bonus +1, Regeneration 10%, Barkskin and +4 str.
